behaviorOnMxFailure.description: The action to take if the required MX record isn't found when you send an email. Valid values: `USE_DEFAULT_VALUE`, `REJECT_MESSAGE`.

mailFromDomain.description: The custom MAIL FROM domain that you want the verified identity to use. Required if `behavior_on_mx_failure` is `REJECT_MESSAGE`.

mailFromDomain.description: The custom MAIL FROM domain that you want the verified identity to use. Required if `behavior_on_mx_failure` is `REJECT_MESSAGE`.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering EmailIdentityMailFromAttributes resources.
